name: Night of the Worm Slayer
description:
The night is dark and full of terrors.
Especially in the realm of the garden gnomes. 

In the Pico 8 game "Night of the Worm Slayer" your garden is being tyrannized by worms. Equipped with a lamp and a garden trowel, you go on a quest to slay the vermin - but don't let the cats see you!

Credits

Design: Carolin Winter

Design/Code: Florian Tamm 

Design/Art/Music: Nina Treuberg (@ravenlilli)

This game was created as part of a Pico 8 Game Jam of the
bm / school of games in Cologne, Germany.
